Subject: Eid Al Fitr Mubarak, Adidas x Farm Rio, Ghawali brand trip, Goal Setting Reminder, Tanagra Suhoor in Qatar
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=599&user=10620> 	
This Eid, we reflect on the bonds that unite us and the strength that lies in our shared journey.

May this special time bring joy, prosperity, and the inspiration to continue building a brighter future together.

To our people, partners, and communities — Eid Mubarak!

في هذا العيد، نتأمل في الروابط التي تجمعنا والقوة النابعة من رحلتنا المشتركة
ونرجو أن يحمل لكم هذا العيد الفرح والازدهار والإلهام لمواصلة بناء مستقبل أكثر إشراقًا معًا
عيد مبارك لجميع أفرادنا وشركائنا ومجتمعاتنا
 
كل عام وأنتم بخير


Click here to find out more about the Eid holidays  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=599&user=10620>

chunks.text:
Click here to find out more about the Eid holidays  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=599&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

ADIDAS <3 FARM RIO


For over a decade, Adidas and Farm Rio have been merging sport and style with bold energy, and their latest capsule collection is no exception. Rooted in the universal language of football, this drop reimagines retro sportswear with a tropical twist, bringing a vibrant, joy-fueled aesthetic to the streets. The collection is infused with Farm Rio’s signature tropical motifs, featuring lively florals and birds. 
Available exclusively in our Mall of Emirates store and online <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=600&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=600&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Ghawali Brand Trip

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a14c0b3813e0c21a3e97616ace4ed1f823314996.png> 	

Ghawali is a tribute to the region’s rich culture, seamlessly blending heritage with modern luxury. To celebrate this connection, we hosted an exclusive brand trip, bringing influencers from the GCC and Europe to Bab Al Shams for a three-day immersive experience. Guests explored the world of Ghawali through thoughtfully curated activities, including fragrance layering, horseback riding, a magical starlit dinner, charm-making, coffee crafting workshops as well rejuvenating spa and yoga sessions.

Ghawali is a tribute to the region’s rich culture, seamlessly blending heritage with modern luxury. To celebrate this connection, we hosted an exclusive brand trip, bringing influencers from the GCC and Europe to Bab Al Shams for a three-day immersive experience. Guests explored the world of Ghawali through thoughtfully curated activities, including fragrance layering, horseback riding, a magical starlit dinner, charm-making, coffee crafting workshops as well rejuvenating spa and yoga sessions. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-6-min.png> 	

3 Days Left to Submit your 2025 Goals

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=601&user=10620> 	

Did you know? Regularly reviewing your goals keeps you on track and boosts motivation.

Make this year count—don’t forget to upload your 2025 Goals in DRIVE. Need a hand? Visit the Performance Management page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=601&user=10620>  for useful resources.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png> 	

Tanagra's Suhoor in Qatar

The Art of Connection blended together tradition and modernity in a memorable Suhoor hosted by Tanagra at the Terrace area of Vendôme, Qatar. Guests were treated to a specially curated Suhoor experience by renowned Qatari culinary expert, Hissa Al Sulaiti. The evening showcased Tanagra’s exclusive Ramadan collection alongside a captivating gallery unveiling the brand’s rebranding journey and Ramadan campaign. Following the Suhoor, guests continued the celebration in a cozy gaming lounge, enjoying traditional games and heartfelt conversations.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/2a3596310321027cadbccb900f9a22ee1793262928.gif> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=602&user=10620>
